game.name: Queen Cupcakes
game.description:
Playing games featuring a beautiful queen has been a fantasy for many since their childhood time. A queen is just a like a symbol of the royal personality who is much capable of inspiring many with her nice deeds. Today we are going to explore a brand new kitchen recipe game called Queen Cupcakes. You are sure to have a lot of fun while getting participated in preparing and decorating the delicious cake and making it more beautiful than you have ever imagined.  

Prepare it with vanilla extract, sugar and pink food colorant. An icing for this cupcakes will be making the queen crown with laffy taffy bards. Then use it to decorate the cupcakes. In this free online cooking game, you would get a wonderful opportunity to learn how to prepare the most exquisite recipe. Play the world most popular kitchen game to enjoy your royal type of mood. It will be amazing to create a delicious dessert by just following a few simple instructions. 

Ask your girl friends to come there and serve them this scrumptious treat. Start this cool html5 game with mixing some milk, flour, eggs, vanilla extract, sugar and butter into a bowl. Take yellow paper cups and pour the batter into it. Then put them in the oven to bake until they get a nice golden brown color. Take another bowl and mix pink food coloring, vanilla, sugar and butter into another bowl. Decorate the top of your cupcakes using the mixture as pink icing. Take some sugar and cream and mixt them with each other. Place a spoon of this mixture on top of your cupcakes. Sprinkle some power sugar on top of it then. Use the taffy bars to prepare some golden crowns. Use icing cream and red gel to decorate them and place them on top of your most favourite queen cupcakes in this fun cooking game.
